Pre-Game Insights: The article discusses team strategies and expectations, including the need for Ruturaj Gaikwad or Rahul Tripathi to replace Sanju Samson.
Hardik Pandya and coach Rahul Dravid are expected to maintain the batting lineup with Shubman Gill trying to improve from his debut performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is played at the MCA Stadium in Pune.
India and Sri Lanka have both won one game each at this venue.
Others: Jitesh Sharma is called up as a replacement for Sanju Samson but is not part of the second T20I match.
Rahul Tripathi is likely to be included in the XI as a batting option.
